EADOG_LCD.D_INTERFACESETTINGS: Configure the hardware connection of the LCD display
EADOG_LCD.D_SPIDEV: Select the SPI Bus and Device Number for the LCD
EADOG_LCD.D_RSTPIN: GPIO # of the RPi, that is connected to the reset pin of the LCD.
EADOG_LCD.D_CDPIN: GPIO # of the RPi, that is connected to the CD pin (Cmd/Data) of the LCD.
EADOG_LCD.D_SPEEDHZ: Clock frequency of the LCD in Hertz. Maximum is limited to the specified max of the selected Display.
EADOG_LCD.D_BACKLIGHTPIN: If you have a switchable backlight configured, you can provide the GPIO pin here for automatic backlight switching. If not, put to 0.
EADOG_LCD.D_LCDTYPE: Electronic Assembly DOG Series Display model
EADOG_LCD.D_INVERTED: Invert the display content of the LCD
EADOG_LCD.D_UPSIDEDOWN: Rotate the display content by 180 degrees for cases where the display is built in upside-down
